hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saw a man driving a Badana (a camel for sacrifice) and said to him, "Ride on it." The man said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! It is a Badana." The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Ride on it, woe to you!" on the second or third time

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَوْلِ الرَّجُلِ وَيْلَكَ
